ruling: - [[Light of Judgment]] does NOT target. You select the card when [[Light of Judgment]]'s effect resolves.
- You can look at your opponent's hand when you resolve [[Light of Judgment]]'s effect.
- If your opponent chains [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] to [[Light of Judgment]] and destroys [[The The Sanctuary in the Sky]], the effect of [[Light of Judgment]] is still applied.
